com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base
Class StreamyMemBufferBase<S extends Segment<S>>

java.lang.Object
  com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.MemBufferBase<S>
      com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.StreamyMemBufferBase<S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
MemBuffer, StreamyMemBuffer, Closeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StreamyBytesMemBuffer, StreamyLongsMemBuffer
public abstract class StreamyMemBufferBase<S extends Segment<S>>
extends MemBufferBase<S>
implements StreamyMemBuffer

Intermediate mem buffer base class used for building type-specifc "streamy" buffers.

Method Summary
 void clear()
          Method that will discard contents of this buffer; functionally similar to just skipping all contents, but is more efficient and guaranteed to be atomic operation.
 int skip(int skipCount)
          Method for trying to skip given number of values: will not block, but will skip between 0 and 'skipCount' entries.
